Package com.patiun.library.service

Interface BookService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookServiceImpl
public interface BookService
This interface is concerned with manipulating Books in the database and performing other Book-related logic

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteBookById(Long bookId)
    Deletes a Book from the database
    Book
    getBookById(Long id)
    Gets the Book from the database
    List<Book>
    getSpecifiedBooks(Specification<Book> bookSpecification)
    Get all Books that fit the specification from the database
    void
    saveBook(Long id, String title, String authors, String genre, String publisher, java.time.Year publishmentYear, Integer amount)
    Inserts or updates the Book in the database

  • Method Details

    • getSpecifiedBooks

      List<Book> getSpecifiedBooks(Specification<Book> bookSpecification) throws ServiceException
      Get all Books that fit the specification from the database
      Parameters:
      bookSpecification - specification to get the books by
      Returns:
      A List object containing the found books
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if a DaoException occurs

    • getBookById

      Book getBookById(Long id) throws ServiceException
      Gets the Book from the database
      Parameters:
      id - id of the Book in the database
      Returns:
      the requested Book
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if there is no Book with requested id or if a DaoException occurs

    • saveBook

      void saveBook(Long id, String title, String authors, String genre, String publisher, java.time.Year publishmentYear, Integer amount) throws ServiceException, ValidationException
      Inserts or updates the Book in the database
      Parameters:
      id - id of Book. If null, the book is inserted into the database. If not null, the Book is updated in the database
      title - title of the Book
      authors - String representing authors of the Book, separated by commas
      genre - genre of the Book
      publisher - publisher of the Book
      publishmentYear - Year object representing publishment year of the Book
      amount - Integer object representing the number of Book in stock
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if a DaoException occurs
      ValidationException - if the Book with the passed parameters is not deemed valid

    • deleteBookById

      void deleteBookById(Long bookId) throws ServiceException
      Deletes a Book from the database
      Parameters:
      bookId - id of book to be deleted
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if a DaoException occurs
